= Classes =
= Property-List=
Property Lists are tabular data structure containing zero or more entries, each entry is associated with a key, which is called value or property. Every indicator (value) in a property list is unique, i.e No duplications among indicators. Important property of the property list is, any update to it is a destructive(alters the property list rather than making a new one).
